name: Intergalactic PSHRS
description:
Made in <48 Hours for the Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam 2019!

Space is very dangerous! Sometimes, space stations on the very edge of known space get overrun with alien monsters - and the inhabitants are forced to abandon their most valuable possessions: Holiday Gifts!

You are a member of an elite, special team called: Package Salvage & Holiday Rescue Squad - or PSHRS.

Your task is to breach overrun space stations, grab as many lost packages as you can and then get back to your ship.

The stations you will be encountering are overrun with hostile aliens - shoot them with your blaster to defeat them.

Life support on these stations is offline, so you'll need to keep an eye on your 02 meter - if it runs out before you can make it back to your ship, you'll perish!

Taking damage from aliens will deplete your 02 as well, so be careful!

ONLY packages you return to your ship will be recovered and sent to their proper destination.

Good Luck!

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

X or SPACE to SHOOT

P to PAUSE

Gamepads might work? 🤷‍♂️

There's a LOT more that I would have liked to implement (like SOUND, more ENEMIES, UPGRADES, better MAPS, etc), but there just wasn't enough time for a one-person team! 

I hope it works bug-free, but... I'm running on NO sleep!
